# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe is worth every penny of its $10000 value to you. Given its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this item at a special introductory price of $9500. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for high-quality products. Please let me know if you're interested in securing this deal, so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
